channel.title: Development of my server
channel.description:
FIrst server so please give good feedback
At this moment, I can't portforward because I have a wireless router. My birthday is soon and I am "hopefully" getting a laptop to portforward. My dad has a laptop but he won't let me use it. These pictures are a bit old because I uploaded them on my friends server site. I would post more pictures but silab client and v6 downloadable client is down. I've added more into the elite shop and a bounty hunter in progress. I made 3 new godsword specials (changed zam gs sorry D D 3 :\) I don't have hyper cam it is hard to take pics of specials. I've also added rune crossbow with use(cross) void. It trains range but doesn't use arrows and has a special that hits 50.
This is half of my progress: This is my progress:
[IMG]http://img508.imageshack.us/img508/1476/purezscapehj0.png[/img]
[IMG]http://img508.imageshack.us/img508/1227/purezscape2vg8.png[/img]
[IMG]http://img132.imageshack.us/img132/5965/purezscape3cd0.png[/img]
[IMG]http://img521.imageshack.us/img521/390/purezscape4th2.png[/img]
[IMG]http://img521.imageshack.us/img521/3031/purezscape5cy1.png[/img]
[IMG]http://img132.imageshack.us/img132/9241/purezscape6hw7.png[/img]
[IMG]http://img166.imageshack.us/img166/4416/purezscape7xp4.png[/img]
[IMG]http://img132.imageshack.us/img132/8443/purezscape8if7.png[/img]
[IMG]http://img132.imageshack.us/img132/7740/purezscape9cd7.png[/img]
[IMG]http://img166.imageshack.us/img166/9787/purezscape10cv6.png[/img]
[IMG]http://img166.imageshack.us/img166/2355/purezscape11cd5.png[/img]
All of this is hiyascape v1. MAY change it to battlescape pk v2 just have to change weapon speeds, exp, and some minor glitchs

Just get one of the really old sources before Silab released her client…Work on it.

item.title: Development of my server
item.dc:creator: @n0va_k0 n0va k0
item.description:
@n0va_k0 wrote:

Again my first server :, I am using squal707’s client because it’s called pures-scape v2 XD. I’ve added Zamorak Boss already including the Bandos + saradomin bosses thanks to squal. Also added real bandos,armadyl, zamorak godsword specials. That’s kinda the reason why I said I may switch to battlescape pk v2 because it doesn’t have silab and I don’t feel like decoding all the silab items on hiyascape v1.

Read full topic
